channel.title: Ssl on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ssl on Blog

item.title: vCenter Converter 5 low processing rate
item.description: If you experience too slow conversion speed while doing P2V migration or other conversion task and see no reason for this, the solution might be to disable SSL encryption for data transfers between agent and server. To accomplish this open the file ‘C:\ProgramData\VMware\VMware vCenter Converter Standalone\converter-worker.xml’, navigate to nfc section of xml and set false in useSSL tag. Restarting ‘Converter Worker’ service is required. Hope this’ll help!
